metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the Flaming Fist privates sparring at the training grounds at the barracks near the Basilisk Gate.

0.speaker: Fist Koltz
0.text: I just need a moment, catch my breath...
0.context: NodeContext: He's very tired from drills.

1.speaker: Fist Koltz
1.text: I am never. Sleeping on duty. Again.
1.context: NodeContext: The Gauntlet is his drillmaster. Panting, exhausted
